params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the requested instance. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

params.name: data.field_mask
params.description: If field_mask is present, specifies the subset of [Instance][google.spanner.admin.instance.v1.Instance] fields that should be returned. If absent, all [Instance][google.spanner.admin.instance.v1.Instance] fields are returned.
